getToolTipLocation

public java.awt.Point getToolTipLocation(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Returns the tooltip location in this component's coordinate system. By default null is returned and Swing will choose a location. This implementation changes it to always point at the mouse pointer location.

Overrides:
getToolTipLocation in class javax.swing.JComponent
Parameters:
e - the MouseEvent that caused the ToolTipManager to show the tooltip
Returns:
mouse pointer position
